eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.socialgraphmining

Class SwitchableMiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.socialgraphmining.SocialGraphMiner
      • eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.socialgraphmining.SwitchableMiner

  • public class SwitchableMiner
extends SocialGraphMiner
    This class enables switching between different SocialGraphMiner implementations for performing predictions while training them at the same time. After initializing it, add miners using its createMiner(String, Class) method. The active miner can be selected using the setActiveMiner(String) method.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Krasanakis

    • Method Detail

      • createMiner

        public <SocialGraphMinerClass extends SocialGraphMiner> SocialGraphMinerClass createMiner(java.lang.String minerName,
                                                                                          java.lang.Class<SocialGraphMinerClass> minerClass)
        Creates a miner of the given name for the given SocialGraphMiner class by calling its constructor that takes a social ego network as parameter. The created miner is stored in this object and is notified for new interactions alongside all other SocialGraphMiner.newInteraction(Interaction, String, InteractionType) miners, regardless of whether it is set as the currently active miner by this class's respective method or not. Parameters of created miners are aggregated in this class through its SocialGraphMiner.getModelParameters(Interaction) implementation and are de-aggregated at the receiving end of interactions. To manually instantiate a miner, use registerMiner(String, SocialGraphMiner) instead.
        Parameters:
        minerName - The name to be assigned at the miner.
        minerClass - The class of the created miner (should have a constructor with exactly one SocialEgoNetwork argument).
        SocialGraphMinerClass - The implicitly understood class of the created miner.
        Returns:
        The created miner.
        See Also:
        getMiner(String), setActiveMiner(String)

      • registerMiner

        public void registerMiner(java.lang.String minerName,
                          SocialGraphMiner miner)
        Registers a miner instance with the given name (see createMiner(String, Class) for details on registered miners). The provided miner instance should have the same same SocialGraphMiner.getContextualEgoNetwork() instance as the SwitchableMiner.
        Parameters:
        minerName - The name to be assigned at the miner.
        miner - The implicitly understood class of the created miner.
        See Also:
        getMiner(String), setActiveMiner(String)

      • getMiner

        public SocialGraphMiner getMiner(java.lang.String minerName)
        Retrieves a miner previously created with createMiner(String, Class) by its given name.
        Parameters:
        minerName - The name of the created miner.
        Returns:
        The created miner.
        See Also:
        getCreatedMinerNames()

      • setActiveMiner

        public SocialGraphMiner setActiveMiner(java.lang.String minerName)
        Gets a created miner with getMiner(String) and, if such a miner is found, this is set as the active miner. The active miner is subsequently called to expose its outcome of predictNewInteraction(Context, Node) and recommendInteractions(Context). Other functionalities are shared between all created miners.
        Parameters:
        minerName - The name of the miner to set as the
        Returns:
        The new active miner
        See Also:
        getActiveMiner(), createMiner(String, Class)

      • constructModelParameterObject

        public SocialGraphMiner.SocialGraphMinerParameters constructModelParameterObject(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction interaction)
        Description copied from class: SocialGraphMiner
        Retrieves the parameters of the mining model that will be sent alongside the created interaction. This method is wrapped by SocialGraphMiner.getModelParameters(Interaction) to potentially not construct parameters at all, if SocialGraphMiner.setSendPermision(boolean).
        Parameters:
        interaction - The new interaction the user receives expressed in terms of the contextual ego network
        Returns:
        A SocialGraphMiner.SocialGraphMinerParameters object of miner parameters.

      • predictNewInteraction

        public double predictNewInteraction(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context context,
                                    eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node destinationNode)
        Description copied from class: SocialGraphMiner
        Predicts the weight of performing a SEND interaction between the given context's ego and a destination node within a given context. This method should typically return values in the [0,1] range, where higher values correspond to more likely interactions.
        Specified by:
        predictNewInteraction in class SocialGraphMiner
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which to perform the prediction.
        destinationNode - The destination node of the interaction.
        Returns:
        The weight of performing the interaction (higher values are more likely).

      • recommendInteractions

        public java.util.HashMap<eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node,java.lang.Double> recommendInteractions(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context context)
        Description copied from class: SocialGraphMiner
        Calls SocialGraphMiner.predictNewInteraction(Context, Node) to score the likelihood of interacting with all nodes of the given context.
        Overrides:
        recommendInteractions in class SocialGraphMiner
        Parameters:
        context - The context for which to recommend interactions.
        Returns:
        A hash map of node scores (larger is more likely to occur.
